page.title: 07TRAFFIC IN SUMMERCOURT
page.content: As in most parts of Cornwall the summer influx of visitors presents a problem.This certainly happens along the main A30 trunk road which runs through Summercourt but throughout the year traffic through the village is heavy and increasing in volume and size of vehicle year by year. The problem in the centre of Summercourt is the road crossing-the main Newquay to St Austell road across the A30.To overcome the difficulties, traffic lights were installed years ago but in summer these only aggravate a problem of volume along the main road. Discussions have been in progress trying to establish a route to by pass the village but as in all such cases too many people have individual interests.It is planned to build a by pass to the North of the village.
